title: Close To Falling
description: Close To Falling is a captivating, second chance romance about tragedy, adolescence and unconditional love.Having witnessed her parent's murder Maddie's once happy existence is turned upside down. River's father was sentenced to hard time, giving him no other option but to live a life he didn't choose. With both of them tossed into the same foster home, they develop feelings for one another, but Maddie makes poor choices leading to a daily struggle of addiction and River's never been one to follow the rules. He makes a tough decision to help save the girl he loves, but he may be the reason she falls.
author: Paige P. Horne
